name: Tomato Bruschetta from Target
author: Target Test Kitchen
summary: Grill baguette slices until warm and lightly crisp. Top with creamy mozzarella, fresh basil and sweet cocktail tomatoes. Enjoy the flavors of summer.
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) package sweet cocktail tomatoes, cut into quarters
¼ cup thinly sliced fresh basil leaves
1 (8 ounce) ball or log fresh mozzarella cheese, roughly chopped or torn
2 tablespoons olive oil plus additional for brushing
directions: Combine tomatoes, basil, mozzarella, 2 tablespoons olive oil and 1/4 teaspoon salt in large bowl
Grill bread slices 2 to 3 minutes, turning as needed, until grill marks appear
Serve with tomato-basil mixture for topping
Season with salt and freshly cracked black pepper
